Presentation

Class PromotionalPackageUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Presentation.PromotionalPackageUI

  • public class PromotionalPackageUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the boundary Promotional Package UI to interact with the user.
    Since:
    6th November 2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adrian Wang Wenjie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PromotionalPackageUI() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createPackage()
      This function retrieves a list of items for the user to select from in order to add it into the promotional package.
      static void removePackage()
      This function ask the user to select a promotional package from a list of promotional packages he/she wishes to delete.
      static void updatePackage()
      This function ask the user to select a promotional package from a list of promotional package he/she wishes to update.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PromotionalPackageUI

        public PromotionalPackageUI()

    • Method Detail

      • createPackage

        public static void createPackage()
        This function retrieves a list of items for the user to select from in order to add it into the promotional package. Then ask the user input for the promotional package name and price.

      • updatePackage

        public static void updatePackage()
        This function ask the user to select a promotional package from a list of promotional package he/she wishes to update. This function is only able to update the promotional package's price.

      • removePackage

        public static void removePackage()
        This function ask the user to select a promotional package from a list of promotional packages he/she wishes to delete.
